alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 3:46AM CST until March 08 at 12:25AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Trempealeau River at Arcadia affecting Trempealeau and Buffalo Counties. For the Trempealeau River...including Arcadia, Dodge...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trempealeau River at Arcadia. * WHEN...Minor flooding will continue into this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding begins. A few streets are affected by high water, and pumping operations begin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 8.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 8.2 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse.
